clause.title: Separation of sprinklered and non-sprinklered areas

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Where a part of a building is not protected with sprinklers, the sprinklered and non-sprinklered parts must be fire-separated with a wall or floor which mustâ€”

ol.li: comply with any specific requirement of the Deemed-to-Satisfy Provisions of the BCA; or
where there is no specific requirement, comply with the relevant part of AS 2118, FPAA101D or FPAA101H.
